params.amount: Total fee required to create all heroes from the tree. The given amount of {gameToken} will be transferred from the signer to the balance. Pass 0 to skip transferring.

params.indexTree: Index of the required tree in {merkleRoots}. The merkle tree is selected by signer off-chain according to data received through {userInfo}.

returns.claimStartedOut: Values of is-claim-started for each registered merkle tree
returns.heroesAvailableOut: Count of heroes available for each registered merkle tree. If claiming for the given tree is not started heroesAvailable is 0 because the value is initialized at the first call of create().

merkleRoots.details: First tree is registered in constructor. Other trees can be added later using {addTree}

create(bytes32[],uint256,uint256,address.notice: Create new hero using. Verification is made using merkle tree with the given {indexTree}.Signer should put enough game token on balance of the contract before the call. Simplest way to do it is to approve {heroCreationFee} amount and call {sendHeroCreationFee}

heroesAvailable(bytes32,address).notice: merkleRoot => claimant => remain available heroes (or 0 if the claim is not started)

merkleRoots(uint256).notice: List of roots of registered merkle trees

merkleRootsLength().notice: Total count of registered merkle trees >= 1

verify(bytes32[],address,uint256,uint256.notice: Try to verify using the merkle tree with the given {indexTree}
